Additional Scope Comments: ACF is a component agency within the Department of Health and Human Services.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure
Transfer Instructions: Transfer of records will be 15 years after employees tenure.
Legacy Email Scope: Limited legacy email exists for this agency, as traditional records management with print and file policy was enforced prior to capstone adaption.  Also, HHS has captured all SES/Political email accounts since Nov 2014. All legacy email in the employees mailbox at that time was retained.

Additional Scope Comments: NEH will utilize items 010 and 011. Accounts for roles identified in this document are accounts to be treated as permanent records (item 010); all other NEH email accounts will be managed under the retention policies described for item 011. In all cases, emails will be managed within the live email system.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure.
Legacy Email Scope: NEH will implement the Capstone policy here on a day-forward basis from the approval of this form NA-1005. NEH will transfer legacy email, dating back to approximately 2009. Prior to 2009, NEH implemented a print and file policy.
